pr_title: Make README and CHANGELOG changes for new guidelines

timeline.message: Update search readme according to new guidelines

timeline.bodyText: @sima-zhu I'm curious about these versions. com.azure:azure-search-documents is a renamed com.azure:azure-search and com.azure:azure-search was released as 11.0.0-beta.1 however there is no released com.azure:azure-search-documents so the current and dependency versions should be same. (Obviously nothing in the tree currently uses the dependency version of this otherwise we would have seen compilation errors.) My recommendation here is to set both the current and dependency versions to 1.0.0-beta.1.
timeline.author: JimSuplizio

replies.bodyText:
The version name aligns with all languages.
@tg-msft might have further explanation on the decision.
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: This was something we discussed in the Search crew and decided to go with beta.2 to indicate to customers that it's the second preview of this library.  The hope was to make it clearer to anyone who goes digging through history that something came before this.  Sima is correct that all the other languages are aligning to Preview.2, beta.2, b2, etc.
replies.author: tg-msft

timeline.bodyText: @alzimmermsft what should happen here, with the versions in the changelog, since this library has been renamed? Also, if this is being re-versioned and the previous release was only a beta should we even keep the 11* version stuff in here?
timeline.author: JimSuplizio
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,10 +1,19 @@
 # Release History
 
-## 11.0.0-beta.2 (2020-04-03)
+## 1.0.0-beta.2 (2020-04-03)
 
+- Renamed the azure-search module to azure-search-documents.
+- Changed the namespace com.azure.search to com.azure.search.documents.
 - Added support for continuation tokens to resume server-side paging.
 - Replaced `SearchApiKeyCredential` with `AzureKeyCredential`.
+- Moved `AzureKeyCredentialPolicy` to Azure Core.
 - Fixed a bug where the Date header wouldn't be updated with a new value on request retry.
+- Changed the field type of `CustomAnalyzer`.
+- Made `RangeFacetResult` and `ValueFacetResult` object strongly typed.
+- Added helper function for IndexBatchException. 
+- Added ScoringParameter class.
+- Refactored some boolean field getter.
+- Made `IndexDocumentsBatch` APIs plurality.
 
 ## 11.0.0-beta.1 (2020-03-10)

replies.bodyText: Synced offline. Leave the change log as it is so that customer is aware of the version history.
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: Added notes to make it clear.
replies.author: sima-zhu
